private void init3DScene(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
Initialize the 3d scene.
  • Initialize universe
  • Initialize universeRoot
  • Initialize sceneCenterTransform
  • Initialize sceneTransform
  • Configure the mouse behaviours (rotation, zoom, translation).
  • Initialize java3DFrame
